content: IAH: I AM HACKER is an isometric survival RTS rogue-lite game ðŸŽ® about hackers, pc users, and their lives. Explore the fictional internet and create your bot army using a computer mouse or programming language.Game Website:https://iamhacker.netCrypto Edition Website:https://iamhacker.net/crypto.htmlAll relevant information is on the website; no ICO or secret Pre-Sale exists.Players that want to play Crypto Edition can only buy a game with IAH Tokens, and partners that want to be gamified within the game need to pay an integration fee also paid in IAH Tokens.Have a good one! Let me know if you have any questions; I have this page bookmarked and will try to make myself available for questions as they arise.

comments.author: BigBossMan0712
comments.body: IAH: I AM HACKER B2B Sales Portal is live, and salespeople can earn revenue by brokering integration deals.https://iamhacker.net/sales.html
